message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good chunk of money.
Let's split it evenly. It's a fair and simple solution. What do you say?
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. This offer is more than fair considering the time pressure and inflation.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but this is the closest I'm willing to go. We both need to be reasonable, otherwise the inflation will eat away at our gains.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before inflation eats away at our potential gains even more. It's a good deal for you!
Alice, we're running out of time.  I'm willing to compromise and move closer to your last offer.  Let's split it this way, and we can both walk away with something decent.
Bob, this is my final offer.  We're both losing money with every passing round. Let's be sensible and end this now.
